channel.title: RuneScape Scams
channel.description:
Hey everyone, Well lately I've been in world 1 regularly selling my 50k coal from RSBot and I've been noticing some scams going around.
Such as - The application scam I think this is an example. rsmod-test.tk www.tk is a website that allows you to make a URL hiding the real one in-case it's too long. Anyone know where they're getting these applications? www.google.com doesn't have a lead to this... Does anyone know the personal site?

item.title: RuneScape Scams
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Life Java Is My Life™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Life wrote:

Thats why there using .TK 'cause it renames a domain.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Scams
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Well, good luck or whatever. It would appear that particular site is of the well known variety which grabs the Runescape.com homepage and simply rehosts it, except for the actual game applet, which is of the scammers own creation and handily steals your information.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Scams
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Life Java Is My Life™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Life wrote:

I don’t want to scam anyone I’m going to fuck up the website or report it to Jagex.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Scams
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Anyone know where they're getting these applications?

Short answer: They make them.

Long answer: Cheating is not scamming; we don’t support scamming here. If you want to figure out how a scam works, go ahead, and if you want to use that knowledge to make your own scam or on the other hand help people to not get scammed, that’s cool too. But this community is focused on cheating, not scamming.

Read full topic
